title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.12 - Premium and collateral accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.12 - Premium and collateral accounts

State Regulations

Every bail agent shall hold premium and cash collateral collected in an account separate from the bail agent's own funds. All funds shall be maintained in accordance with sections 20.3 and
20.4
of this Title (Insurance Regulation 29A). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
28.12

Adopted

New

York State Register November 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 47, eff. 3/19/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
